thread.title: Lamar Odom Speaks and Opens His Eyes, According to Source
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Speaks and Opens His Eyes, According to Source

author: Kelly Terez
title: Lamar Odom Speaks and Opens His Eyes, According to Source
text:
Share Article 
Angela Weiss/Getty Images (LAS VEGAS) -- ABC News has confirmed that Lamar Odom opened his eyes and was able to verbally communicate Friday after being unconscious for days in a Las Vegas hospital. 
Odom has been in the hospital since Tuesday after a stay at the Love Ranch in Crystal, Nevada, for a few days. Police said Wednesday that workers at the legal brothel told 911 dispatchers the former basketball player had been using cocaine and sexual enhancement drugs in the days before the incident. 
Odom's estranged wife, reality star Khloe Kardashian, has been by his bedside since he was checked in. Reportedly, she also flew out his father, Joe, and his two teenage children from a previous marriage, to be with Odom. 
Copyright   Friday, October 16, 2015 at 3:11PM
